0000011010000101 1001011011110010 0 -> sum: 1001110101110111, cout: 0
1010110001001000 0001001010011001 1 -> sum: 1011111011100010, cout: 0
0010000001100010 0001010101001000 0 -> sum: 0011010110101010, cout: 0

1111010011110111 0110010000101100 0 -> sum: 0101100100100011, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
